title: "Applied mechanics and AI combine to deliver patient-specific fracture therapy"
excerpt: "When someone breaks a bone in their lower leg, the fracture can often be complex, making the healing process lengthy and involved. In these cases, it is usual for the fractured bone to be surgically stabilized using an orthopaedic implant."
